ygData.subject: Who do you take first?
ygData.msgSnippet: It happened again yesterday.  I pick a fight with an orc that cons yellow, and a buddy of his joins in who cons blue.  I am working solo so they are both my
ygData.messageBody:
It happened again yesterday. I pick a fight with an orc that cons yellow,
and a buddy of his joins in who cons blue. I am working solo so they are
both my problem alone. I have been trying to figure out the best way to
deal with them.

Take the blue first since I can kill him quicker, thus I will recieve lets
hits total during the fight?

Take the yellow though it will take longer to kill him, and I am getting
attacked by the blue the whole time, its the yellow one is doing the most
damage so the less time I face him the better off I am.

Or is it pretty much a wash either way?
----------
Her, "Are you still making sandwiches?"
Me, "No, now I am making tunics."
Her, "And you make fun of Myst because of the lack of action!"
